name: LekkerWeed
description: Pop-art comic book storefront with mascot Jade, bold halftone textures, starburst animations, and street-culture energy for a young recreational audience.

Mascot-driven brand gallery with 9 Jade illustrations
Color-cycling borders and starburst CSS animations
Speech-bubble testimonial cards with comic shadows
author: BudStacks Platform
